FeedbackText: The Pro-Grade Blender is a beast! It's powerful and quiet. Delivery was also incredibly fast, arrived in one day.
My package with the Comfort-Fit Running Shoes arrived damaged, and the box was completely crushed. Disappointed.
I had to return the blender. It was much larger than expected and didn't fit on my counter. The return was easy.
Are the Comfort-Fit shoes waterproof? Need to know before I buy. Your support chat is offline.
Fast shipping is great, but the Pro-Grade Blender's lid doesn't seem to seal properly. Seems like a defect.
